org.lukep.javavis.program.java
Class JavaSourceLoaderThread

java.lang.Object
  org.lukep.javavis.program.java.JavaSourceLoaderThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, ISourceLoaderThread
public class JavaSourceLoaderThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISourceLoaderThread

Following the construction of a list of "compilation units", the JavaSourceLoaderThread adds a custom JavaCodeProcessor (an implementation of AbstractProcessor) to the compiler’s CompilationTask. When the task is executed, the JavaCodeTreeVisitor scans the parsed tokens and calls methods in the GenericModelFactory to produce descendants of AbstractModel.
